func.title: SetAttachBones

param.name: attach_number
param.desc: Number of the attached mesh. The return value of AttachMesh provides such a number.

param.name: parent_bone
param.desc: Bone of the calling object at which to attach the mesh.

param.name: child_bone
param.desc: Bone of the object to be attached.

func.desc: If a mesh was previously attached to another mesh then this function can be used to change one or both of the bones at which they are attached. To only change a single bone the other parameter can be set to nil.

example.text: Script for an effect: Initially the clonk carries a bow and for each timer call the bow is switched from its left hand to its right hand or vice versa.
